get.description: Exposes environment information for this application, such as properties and profiles
Returns property value by the given name
Shows application health information (when the application is secure, a simple ‘status’ when accessed over an unauthenticated connection or full message details when authenticated)
Displays arbitrary application info, e.g. information about the build
Exposes Swagger UI that allows to visualize and interact with the application REST API
